title: Beemac Logistics Hires Dan Costantino as Vice President of National Account Solutions
text:
BEAVER, Pa.--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- Beemac Logistics, a premier full service transportation and logistics provider since 1984, today announced that Dan Costantino has joined the company as Vice President of National Account Solutions.
Mr. Costantino will be responsible for developing and overseeing Beemac’s managed transportation solutions as well as the company’s strategic growth into National Accounts. Mr. Costantino has substantial experience in the transportation and logistics industry, having spent over 17 years in various leadership roles helping customers reduce costs, improve service and enhance quality across supply chains.
Michael Ceravolo, Vice President, Supply Chain of Beemac Logistics, commented, “We are incredibly excited to continue our transformation of Beemac Logistics by building a world-class team that will help us win market leadership in our industry. Dan brings substantial executive-level business development experience and 3PL expertise to our brand, which we are thrilled to leverage as we execute on our expansion efforts and build our national presence.”
Mr. Costantino joins Beemac Logistics during a period of rapid growth. The Company delivered Q4 2017 estimated net sales year-over-year growth of 445% in the highly fragmented logistics segment. The Company continues to develop its expansion with new offices opening in Cleveland, OH and Houston, TX as well as additional offices planned later this year.
About Beemac Logistics
Established in 1984 by owner Richard Macklin, Beemac Logistics is a premier full service, third party logistics provider. Beemac handles thousands of loads per month across all major freight modes including flatbed, van, refrigerated, rail, barge, ocean and air. The Company provides cost effective solutions to your transportation and logistics challenges throughout North America by partnering with over 15,000 carrier partners, along with Class-1 railroads and major barge lines. Beemac is a single source solution for all transportation related needs including end-to-end visibility and 24/7/365 service. To learn more, visit www.beemaclogistics.com or call 724-359-0073.
